description.p: executes theGenia Tagger on annotations from the layer and record the results in the features specified by , , and . reinforces sentences specified by annotations in the layer.

param-doc.name: geniaCharset
param-doc.p: Character encoding of geniatagger input and output.

param-doc.name: pos
param-doc.p: Feature where to put the POS tag.

param-doc.name: sentences
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: documentFilter
param-doc.p: Only process document that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: entity
param-doc.p: Feature where to put the entity status.

param-doc.name: chunk
param-doc.p: Feature where to put the chunk status.

param-doc.name: words
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing word annotations.

param-doc.name: sectionFilter
param-doc.p: Process only sections that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: wordForm
param-doc.p: Feature containing the word surface form.

param-doc.name: lemma
param-doc.p: Feature where to put the word lemma.

param-doc.name: sentenceFilter
param-doc.p: Evaluated as a boolean with the sentence annotation as the context element. only process the sentence if the result is true. To filter sentences that are too long for Genia Tagger, use "length < 1024".

param-doc.name: geniaTaggerExecutable
param-doc.p: Name of the geniatagger executable file.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
